amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funds for energy efficiency and renewable energy by $9.75 million and decrease funds for fossil energy research and development by $13 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for Energy efficiency and renewable energy by $9,750,000 and decrease funds for fossil energy research and development by $13,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 251 (Roll no. 245).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 251 (Roll no. 245).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Polis.
